abstract: Information about the resource to load.
overview:
## Discussion

Use the value of this property to get the URL of the requested resource, and any additional details. It is safe to retrieve the value of this property even after WebKit cancels the load request by calling your handler’s [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKURLSchemeHandler/webView(_:stop:)] method.

# request

**Instance Property**

Information about the resource to load.

## Declaration

```swift
var request: URLRequest { get }
```

## Discussion

Use the value of this property to get the URL of the requested resource, and any additional details. It is safe to retrieve the value of this property even after WebKit cancels the load request by calling your handler’s [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKURLSchemeHandler/webView(_:stop:)] method.
title: request
